## hpr2980 :: FLOSS Weekly 553 - Hacker Public Radio

 On the 30th Oct 2019 Kevin Oâ€™Brien (Ahuka) and Ken Fallon were interviewed about Hacker Public Radio by Randal Schwartz and Aaron Newcomb for FLOSS Weekly 553.
This is that show and is released under a Creative Commons Attribution Non-Commercial No-Derivatives 4.0 International license.
